header.title: [ID] AI Prompt Guide
header.subtitle: [ID] Advanced AI prompting techniques and optimization for maximum testing effectiveness

introduction.title: [ID] Master AI Prompting
introduction.description: [ID] Learn how to write effective prompts that get the best results from AI-powered testing.

promptPrinciples.title: [ID] Core Prompting Principles
promptPrinciples.description: [ID] Follow these principles for effective AI communication:

clarity.title: [ID] 1. Be Clear and Specific
clarity.description: [ID] Use precise language and avoid ambiguity
clarity.example:
[ID] Good: 'Click the blue Submit button in the footer'
Bad: 'Click the button'

context.title: [ID] 2. Provide Context
context.description: [ID] Give the AI enough context to understand the scenario
context.example:
[ID] Good: 'After logging in, navigate to user profile settings'
Bad: 'Go to settings'

structure.title: [ID] 3. Use Logical Structure
structure.description: [ID] Organize steps in a logical, sequential order
structure.example:
[ID] Good: Step-by-step instructions with clear flow
Bad: Jumping between unrelated actions

validation.title: [ID] 4. Include Validation
validation.description: [ID] Always specify what should be verified
validation.example:
[ID] Good: 'Verify the success message appears'
Bad: 'Submit the form' (without validation)

advancedTechniques.title: [ID] Advanced Techniques
advancedTechniques.description: [ID] Sophisticated prompting strategies for complex scenarios:

conditionalLogic.title: [ID] Conditional Logic
conditionalLogic.description: [ID] Handle different scenarios based on page state or data
conditionalLogic.example: [ID] If user is already logged in, skip login and go to dashboard

errorHandling.title: [ID] Error Handling
errorHandling.description: [ID] Anticipate and handle potential errors gracefully
errorHandling.example: [ID] If login fails, capture error message and retry with different credentials

dynamicContent.title: [ID] Dynamic Content
dynamicContent.description: [ID] Work with content that changes based on data or state
dynamicContent.example: [ID] Select the first available product from the search results

multiStepFlows.title: [ID] Multi-Step Flows
multiStepFlows.description: [ID] Break complex workflows into manageable steps
multiStepFlows.example: [ID] Complete checkout process: cart → shipping → payment → confirmation

optimization.title: [ID] Prompt Optimization
optimization.description: [ID] Strategies to improve performance and reduce costs:

tokenEfficiency.title: [ID] Token Efficiency
tokenEfficiency.description: [ID] Write concise prompts that achieve maximum results with minimal tokens
tokenEfficiency.tips: [ID] • Use action verbs • Avoid redundant descriptions • Focus on essentials

reusability.title: [ID] Reusable Patterns
reusability.description: [ID] Create prompt templates for common scenarios
reusability.tips: [ID] • Standard login flows • Form validation patterns • Navigation sequences

testing.title: [ID] Prompt Testing
testing.description: [ID] Test and refine prompts using the Test Recorder
testing.tips: [ID] • Use Test Recorder for experimentation • A/B test different approaches • Monitor success rates

examples.description: [ID] Practical examples showing effective prompt patterns:

ecommerce.description: [ID] Complete purchase flow with cart, shipping, and payment

dashboard.description: [ID] Complex dashboard navigation and data manipulation

forms.description: [ID] Multi-step forms with validation and conditional fields

issues.elementNotFound: [ID] • Element not found → Use semantic descriptions instead of technical selectors
issues.ambiguousInstructions: [ID] • Ambiguous instructions → Add more context and specific details
issues.timingIssues: [ID] • Timing issues → Add explicit wait conditions
issues.validationFailures: [ID] • Validation failures → Be more specific about expected outcomes
